health_sector_discussed_people_names: Hon. Njuguna Mwaura, Hon. William Mutai, Hon. Anthony Kanyere, Hon. Isaac Rottok, Hon. Stanley Karanja, Hon. John Macharia, Hon. Alex Mbugua
health_data_information_systems_summary: The Committee on Health Services visited Nakuru Level 5 Hospital (PGH) to assess the quality of services offered, the working environment of the staff, challenges faced, and make recommendations for improvement.
health_data_challenges: Shortage of Human Resource, transition of equipment and resources, incomplete Trauma Centre, lack of proper fencing, malfunctioning waste management systems, land ownership disputes
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco:
1. Allocate funds for recruitment and hiring of staff, refurbishment of infrastructure, and repairing of Cold Rooms
2. Complete the Trauma Centre
3. Ensure operational waste management systems
4. Resolve land ownership disputes
5. Address delays in NHIF reimbursement
6. Supervise and manage underutilized medical staff effectively
7. Collaborate with the Ministry of Health to improve training for medical staff
